relationships.description: Black's gaunt face broke into the first true smile Harry had seen upon it.
Crookshanks darted up first; he had evidently pressed his paw to the knot on the trunk,
Lupin, Pettigrew, and Ron clambered upward without any sound of savaging branches.
Black saw Snape up through the hole,
At last, all of them were out. The grounds were very dark now; the only light came from the distant windows of the castle. Without a word, they set oï¬€.
